vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐνισχύω,
strengthen, confirm, ὁ χρόνος ταῦτα -ύσει πάντα [NT+5th c.BC+]:—passive, [Refs 4th c.AD+]
__II intransitive, prevail in or among, ἐν ταῖς πόλεσι ἐνισχύει τὰ νόμιμα [Refs 4th c.BC+]; ἐνίσχυσεν ὡς.. the opinion prevailed that.., [Refs]

relatedNos._zh_tw_Gloss: 在, 裡, 藉著, 靠 ...
relatedNos._zh_Gloss: 在, 里, 借着, 靠 ...

vocabInfos.shortDef: to strengthen (another); to regain (one’s own) strength
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to strengthen (another); to regain (one’s own) strength
to strengthen, impart strength and vigor, Lk. 22:43; intransitive to gain, acquire, or recover strength and vigor, be strengthened, Acts 9:19*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: intrans. recobrar las fuerzas ; trans. fortalecer
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 茁壯, 得著能力
2) 使強壯, 增強鞏固 (路 22:43; 徒 9:19)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 茁壮, 得着能力
2) 使强壮, 增强巩固 (路 22:43; 徒 9:19)
